mapper.sql: select u.user_id, u.dept_id,u.emp_id, u.login_name, u.user_name, u.email,u.birthday,u.address,u.office_phone, u.phonenumber, u.sex, u.avatar, u.password, u.salt, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_time, u.remark, d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.status as dept_status, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.status as role_status from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id
mapper.select:
select u.user_id,u.emp_id, u.login_name, u.user_name, u.email,u.birthday,u.address,u.office_phone , u.phonenumber, u.password, u.sex, u.avatar, u.salt, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by , u.create_time, u.remark, d.dept_name,r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where u.del_flag = '0'
AND u.login_name like concat('%', #{loginName}, '%')
AND u.status = #{status}
AND u.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%')
AND date_format(u.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(u.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
AND (u.dept_id = #{deptId} OR u.dept_id IN ( SELECT t.dept_id FROM sys_dept t WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},ancestors) ))
${params.dataScope}
where u.login_name = #{userName}
where u.dept_id = #{deptId}
where u.phonenumber = #{phonenumber}
where u.email = #{email}

select user_id, phonenumber from sys_user where phonenumber=#{phonenumber}
select user_id, email from sys_user where email=#{email}

select distinct u.user_id as id, concat(d.dept_name,'-',u.user_name) as text from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id where u.del_flag = '0' AND u.emp_id like concat(#{userName}, '%') or u.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%') or u.login_name like concat(#{userName}, '%')
${params.dataScope}

(select d.dept_name as name, 'false' as checked, d.parent_id as pId, d.dept_id as id, d.dept_name as title, '/img/tree-dept.png' as icon from sys_dept d where d.del_flag = 0 and (d.dept_id in ('100',#{deptId}) or d.dept_id = (select parent_id from sys_dept where dept_id = #{deptId})) order by d.order_num) union all (select CONCAT(user_name,'(',emp_id,')') as name, 'false' as checked, dept_id as pId, user_id as id, CONCAT(user_name,'(',emp_id,')') as title, '/img/tree-user.png' as icon from sys_user where del_flag = 0 and dept_id = #{deptId} order by create_time asc)

(select d.dept_name as name, 'false' as checked, d.parent_id as pId, d.dept_id as id, d.dept_name as title, '/img/tree-dept.png' as icon from sys_dept d where d.del_flag = 0 order by d.order_num) union all (select CONCAT(user_name,'(',emp_id,')') as name, 'false' as checked, dept_id as pId, user_id as id, user_name as title, '/img/tree-user.png' as icon from sys_user where del_flag = 0 order by create_time asc)
